Package p4_group_8_repo.SceneClasses.HighScore.HighScoreControllers

Class HighscoreManager

java.lang.Object
p4_group_8_repo.SceneClasses.HighScore.HighScoreControllers.HighscoreManager
public class HighscoreManager
extends java.lang.Object
Title: Making a simple high-score system Author: Shaddix Date: Aug 27 2009 Code version: 1.0 Availability: http://forum.codecall.net/topic/50071-ystem/ This Class is to get and sort the scores and write it in to a file
